description: After going out for some ‘Q and having one too many dissatisfying experiences, Michael Markham took on a big challenge: provide North Carolina with the tastiest BBQ using his very own natural culinary talents. With a flavorful assortment of juicy smoked meats and an offering of homemade sauces and rubs, each bite is packed with deliciousness and everyone can attest that this truck is really is the best.Be sure to delight your guests at your next event with the wonderful comfort food from Big Mikes BBQ.
name: Big Mikes BBQ
